name: Show dev info on Habitica wiki
description: Automatically expands developer information sections on the Habitica (formerly HabitRPG) Wikia site with a red highlight.

user.name: skaulana
user.about: Hi there! So I guess we both like stylesheets, huh?

additional_info: Inspired by the steps for adding a custom Wikia style as suggested on the "Guidance for Blacksmiths" page. Why bother if you already have Stylish installed? :)
